backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with authorization, user profiles, report storage, international contact lookup types, and persistent maps for reports and provider configs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for international contact lookup and routing updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of multiple frontend files including routing, components, translations, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and PWA metadata.
frontend/LIVE_INTEGRATION_RESTART_RUNBOO: Runbook describing steps to restart and re‑execute the live integration workflow cleanly.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Explains that Phase 3a’s read‑only database canister requires no frontend changes and lists verification points.
frontend/PRODUCTION_BUILD_VERIFICATION.m: Production build checklist covering routing, consent gate, branding, analysis behavior, and PWA validation.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back to the app shell.
frontend/public/data/public-contact-look: Static dataset mapping phone numbers and emails to public directory metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing precaching and a network‑first strategy with offline fallback.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Checklist for verifying WebAPK installation on Android via Chrome, including cleanup and validation steps.
frontend/scripts/live-integration-comple: Wrapper script running the restart integration script and emitting a single success message.
frontend/scripts/restart-live-integratio: Integration helper performing cleanup, dependency checks, builds, and emitting a fixed success string.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application routing pages, registering the service worker, and handling consent gating.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: IDL definition exposing a simple analyzeText API endpoint.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedContactL: Component handling phone/email antifraud lookup with caching, backend queries, and public-source checks.
UI card rendering antifraud scores, public info, and reporting actions for a lookup result.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, and footer handling route changes and localization.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Handles login/logout UI using Internet Identity and shows a profile menu when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results with risk score, categories, and error/empty states.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal requiring acceptance of cookies and terms before continuing, with navigation to terms/privacy pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing branding, ICP security link, public data sources, and Portuguese entities.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button that triggers PWA installation and alerts if installation isn't eligible.
frontend/src/components/InternationalCon: Card showing international contact risk details, country info, scores, and external validation links.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Language switcher dropdown for selecting supported languages using the i18n provider.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Small PWA install button that triggers installation using shared PWA handler.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog for submitting anonymous or authenticated reports with category selection, optional description, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Displays structured fraud analysis results including risk level, explanation, recommendations, sources, and collaborative basis.
User menu showing authenticated principal, lookup history with clearing option, and logout button.
frontend/src/config/features.ts: Defines feature-flag configuration with defaults and helpers for checking PRO and external provider availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdvancedContactLoo: Manages localStorage-backed cache for advanced contact lookup results with add, retrieve, and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and exposes multiple AntiFraud canister actors and logs a readiness report once per session.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Tracks whether user consent is required or accepted using versioned localStorage state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternationalConta: Performs international contact lookups via actor, returning structured details or a fallback when no data exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, creating AuthClient instances and exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline state and returns isOnline and isOffline flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for PWA install logic.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPromptCo: Empty placeholder hook file for PWA install prompt cooldown logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLookupReport: Submits lookup reports to a backend canister, managing loading, error, and success states with localization support.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads, updates, and clears per-identity user history from local storage using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, translation selection, and persistence via React context.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Stores all application translation strings, primarily Portuguese, mapped by language code.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates IC agents and typed actors for main, extra, and reports canisters using fixed canister IDs.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Defines and exports all canister IDs and a helper to retrieve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL and TypeScript interfaces for the extra canister’s phone and crypto report queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL and TypeScript interface for the main canister’s analyzeText method.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL and interfaces for submitting reports and performing email, phone, message, and crypto lookups.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report showing canister IDs and actor availability/method support.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus accessibility and mobile touch adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Renders a documentation overview page with localized text and a PDF generation button using generateDocumentationPdf.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the main fraud‑analysis interface with tabs for message, email, phone, and crypto checks using structured analysis utilities.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays an explanation of verification methods and scoring using localized content and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalMissionP: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/InternationalContactS: Implements an international contact search form with validation, backend lookup, and localized UI.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Shows the mission, vision, values, and social impact sections with localized text and SEO configuration.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page using i18n content and SEO setup, with multiple dynamic sections inside cards.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the terms and conditions page with i18n‑based content, SEO initialization, and sectioned card layout.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Implements PWA install prompt handling by capturing the beforeinstallprompt event and exposing a trigger function.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Provides a minimal custom router using shared state, history API navigation, and listeners for route updates.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Contains normalization helpers and keyword/phrase matching utilities for antifraud text analysis.
frontend/src/utils/contactInputHeuristic: Provides heuristics to detect, normalize, and validate phone or email inputs with multilingual error messages.
Builds a structured documentation object combining static content with Portuguese translations for institutional pages.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Analyzes email strings for scam‑like patterns and flags risky addresses using deterministic heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Generates a downloadable text‑based documentation file by assembling structured content into a formatted string.
frontend/src/utils/highRiskPhrases.ts: Defines high- and medium‑risk fraud phrase patterns with fragments, categories, and weights.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a localStorage‑based cooldown to rate‑limit user submissions.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Provides a heuristic message analyzer that scores scam likelihood using keywords, crypto patterns, URLs, and formatting signals.
frontend/src/utils/publicContactLookup.t: Loads a same‑origin dataset and looks up public contact information for phones or emails.
frontend/src/utils/publicSourceProviders: Aggregates public‑source presence checks using the local dataset and future external providers.
frontend/src/utils/riskScoring.ts: Computes deterministic 0–100 fraud risk scores from weighted factors and maps scores to risk levels.
frontend/src/utils/riskWeights.ts: Defines default risk‑scoring weights and thresholds and exports a shared configuration object.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets page title and meta description at runtime for consistent SEO branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Runs structured heuristic fraud analysis using phrase patterns, normalized text, scoring, and language templates to produce risk results.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Translates Portuguese backend analysis text to other languages using a simple dictionary lookup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash without reloading the page.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages per‑user profiles in localStorage, storing query history and preferences with load, save, and clear helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the international contact lookup module.
